title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.8 - Issuance by commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.8 - Issuance by commission

State Regulations
(a) When
the commission has determined that the applicant possesses the requisite
qualifications to receive a license, it shall issue a license as a games of
chance supplier upon payment by the applicant of a license fee. (b) The fee for such license shall be a sum
equal to $25 plus an amount equal to two per centum of the gross sales or
rentals, if any, of games of chance equipment or supplies to licensed
authorized games of chance organizations and licensed authorized games of
chance lessors by the applicant during the license year, or fiscal year, whichever is specified by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4607.8

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
